name: typescript-in-the-browser
description: attempt to see if and how much we can run typescript compiler in the browser

scripts.bundle-src: npm run tsc && npm run copy-projects-json && browserify dist/src/compiler/main.js --debug -x typescript -t brfs -o static/src.js
scripts.bundle-candombed-src: npm run tsc && npm run copy-projects-json  && browserify dist/src/candombed/main.js --debug -x typescript -x monaco-editor -t brfs -o static/candombed/src.js
scripts.all-typescript: npm run bundle-typescript; npm run minify-typescript
scripts.dev-prepare: rm -rf static dist ; npm run tsc ; npm run copy-projects-json; npm run cp-static ; npm run bundle-typescript ; npm run bundle-src
scripts.dev-candombed-prepare: rm -rf static dist ; npm run tsc ; npm run cp-static; npm run bundle-candombed-src
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watchify" "npm run tsc-watch" "npm run browser-sync" "npm run watch-static"
scripts.dev-candombed: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watchify-candombed" "npm run tsc-watch" "npm run browser-sync" "npm run watch-static"
scripts.all: rm -rf dist static docs; npm run tsc && npm run copy-projects-json && npm run cp-static && npm run all-typescript && npm run bundle-src && npm run minify-src && npm run bundle-candombed-src && npm run minify-candombed-src && mv static docs

author: Sebastian Gurin
